package.name: Chapagain_AutoCurrency
package.summary: A currency switcher extension which automatically switches store currency based on visitor's IP address.
package.description:
Auto Currency extension tracks visitor's IP address and automatically changes the store currency to the visitor's location currency. Visitor can switch to his/her desired currency at any time.
This extension uses MaxMind's GeoIP technology for IP address lookup.
No extra configuration settings is to be made. Just install the module in your multi-currency Magento shop and the module will work on the fly.
Features:-
Easy to install and use 100% Free 100% Open Source
package.notes: Minor text change for configuration settings option
